items.item_details: Attached is theÂ March 10, 2005, Special Board Meeting Agenda (PDF).

meeting_sections.section_name: RESUME OPEN SESSION AT APPROXIMATELY 8:45 P.M. - EDUCATION CENTER BOARD ROOM

items.item_text: Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizen can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.
items.item_text_raw: 3.01 Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizen can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.

items.item_text: For consideration by the Board of Trustees
items.item_text_raw: 4.01 For consideration by the Board of Trustees

meeting_sections.section_name: CONSIDERATION OF PROPOSED AMENDMENTS TO AGENDA

items.item_text: Persons wishing to address the Board must fill out a 'gold' request form, located at the entrance of the Board Room
items.item_text_raw: 5.01 Persons wishing to address the Board must fill out a 'gold' request form, located at the entrance of the Board Room

meeting_sections.section_name: PUBLIC MEMBERS WHO WISH TO ADDRESS THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES

items.item_text: Hold Public Hearing at 8:45 P.M. Regarding Calling an Election for Parcel Tax to be Held on June 7, 2005
items.item_text_raw: 6.01 Hold Public Hearing at 8:45 P.M. Regarding Calling an Election for Parcel Tax to be Held on June 7, 2005

items.item_text: Adopt Resolution #2004/2005-35 Regarding Ordering a Special Election for Parcel Tax to Held on June 7, 2005
items.item_text_raw: 6.02 Adopt Resolution #2004/2005-35 Regarding Ordering a Special Election for Parcel Tax to Held on June 7, 2005
